trans-unit.source: Represents the grammar element that specifies a reference to a rule.
trans-unit.target: 表示指定对规则引用的语法元素。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef> class is particularly useful when you want to reuse an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> element whose contents have already been defined.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>类是特别有用，当你想要重用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>已定义了其内容的元素。

trans-unit.source: By reusing existing rules, you can build complex grammars more quickly.
trans-unit.target: 通过重复使用现有规则，你可以更快地生成复杂的语法。

trans-unit.source: You can use one of the constructors of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef> class to reference an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object or a `rule` element if the following is true:
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用的构造函数之一<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>类来引用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>对象或`rule`元素如果满足以下条件：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object is in the containing grammar and the value of its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Scope%2A> property is <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleScope.Public> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleScope.Private>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>对象中包含的语法和的值是其<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Scope%2A>属性是<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleScope.Public>或<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleScope.Private>。

trans-unit.source: The `rule` element is in an external grammar and the value of its `scope` attribute is `public`.
trans-unit.target: `rule`外部语法和的值中的元素是其`scope`属性是`public`。

trans-unit.source: The `rule` element is in an external grammar, the value of its `scope` attribute is `private`, and it is declared as the `root rule` of the external grammar.
trans-unit.target: `rule`外部的语法的值中的元素是其`scope`属性是`private`，并声明为`root rule`的外部的语法。

trans-unit.source: This class represents the `ruleref` element as defined in the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761).
trans-unit.target: 此类表示`ruleref`元素中 World Wide Web 联合会 (W3C) 定义[语音识别语法规范 (SRGS) 版本 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761)。

trans-unit.source: For information about the SRGS `ruleref` element and details about its support by System.Speech, see [ruleref Element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/56eb0031-4908-4788-83ab-7c5e19aa4ac0).
trans-unit.target: 璝惠 SRGS`ruleref`元素以及它支持通过 System.Speech，有关详细信息请参阅[规则元素引用](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/56eb0031-4908-4788-83ab-7c5e19aa4ac0)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The object to reference.
trans-unit.target: 要引用的对象。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef" /> class and specifies the rule to reference.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef" /> 类和指定引用的规则的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a rule reference to an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object within the containing grammar.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数创建的规则引用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>中包含的语法对象。

trans-unit.source: To create a rule reference to a `rule` element in an external grammar file, use any of the following constructors:
trans-unit.target: 若要创建的规则引用`rule`元素在外部语法文件中，使用任何以下构造函数：

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a grammar that recognizes the phrase "A nation that has won the World Cup is" followed by the name of a country that has won the World Cup.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建识别短语语法"赢得了世界杯 nation is"跟赢得了世界杯的国家/地区的名称。

trans-unit.source: After creating the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object `winnerRule` and giving it the string identifier `WorldCupWinner`, the example appends the string "A nation that has won the World Cup is" to the rule.
trans-unit.target: 在创建后<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>对象`winnerRule`并为其提供的字符串标识符`WorldCupWinner`，该示例将字符串追加"赢得了世界杯 nation is"规则。

trans-unit.source: Using <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> objects, the example then builds a list of European countries and a list of South American countries, and adds each list to its respective rule, `ruleEurope` or `ruleSAmerica`.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>对象，该示例然后生成欧洲国家/地区的列表和列表南美国家/地区，并将每个列表添加到其各自的规则，`ruleEurope`或`ruleSAmerica`。

trans-unit.source: The example then creates rule references for `ruleEurope` and `ruleSAmerica` and adds them to the `WorldCupWinner` rule.
trans-unit.target: 然后，示例创建的规则引用`ruleEurope`和`ruleSAmerica`并将它们添加到`WorldCupWinner`规则。

trans-unit.source: The created grammar has the following form.
trans-unit.target: 创建的语法具有以下形式。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rule" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rule" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The location of a grammar file outside the containing grammar.
trans-unit.target: 包含的语法外的语法文件位置。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef" /> class and specifies the location of the external grammar file to reference.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef" /> 类的新实例并指定要引用的外部语法文件的位置。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a rule reference to an external grammar file.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数创建外部语法文件的规则引用。

trans-unit.source: The URI may also include the identifier of a rule to reference, for example `http://www.contoso.com/ExternalGrammar.grxml#targetRule`.
trans-unit.target: URI 还可能包括的标识符的规则，若要引用，例如`http://www.contoso.com/ExternalGrammar.grxml#targetRule`。

trans-unit.source: If the `uri` parameter does not specify a rule identifier, the rule reference points to the root rule of the target grammar.
trans-unit.target: 如果`uri`参数未指定规则标识符，规则引用所指向的目标语法根规则。

trans-unit.source: To create a rule reference to an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object within the same grammar, use any of the following constructors:
trans-unit.target: 若要创建的规则引用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>对象中的相同的语法，请使用任何以下构造函数：

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a grammar for an application that returns information about bus shuttle service.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建的应用程序返回有关服务总线快速信息语法。

trans-unit.source: The first method, `GrammarUrlForRoute`, takes a string that specifies a route and appends it to a string specifying the location of a grammar.
trans-unit.target: 第一种方法， `GrammarUrlForRoute`，采用字符串，它指定一个路由，并将其追加到一个字符串，指定的语法的位置。

trans-unit.source: This specifies a particular rule in that grammar.
trans-unit.target: 这将在该语法中指定特定的规则。

trans-unit.source: The method returns a `Uri` for that rule.
trans-unit.target: 该方法返回`Uri`该规则。

trans-unit.source: The second method, `CreateGrammarForRoute`, creates an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> element named `grammar` with a rule reference specified by the `Uri` passed to it by `GrammarUrlForRoute`.
trans-unit.target: 第二种方法， `CreateGrammarForRoute`，创建<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>元素名为`grammar`与指定的规则引用`Uri`传递给它的`GrammarUrlForRoute`。

trans-unit.source: Note that the variable named _route is a member of an enclosing class.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，变量名为 _route 封闭类的成员。

trans-unit.source: The variable named _`route` is undeclared and undefined in the preceding sample.
trans-unit.target: 名为 _ 变量`route`是未声明和在前面的示例未定义。

trans-unit.source: It should be declared as a <xref:System.String> and contain the route number for a particular bus route before the preceding sample is compiled and run.
trans-unit.target: 它应声明为<xref:System.String>和包含为特定的总线路由的路由数目之前编译并运行上面的示例。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="uri" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="uri" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The object to reference.
trans-unit.target: 要引用的对象。

trans-unit.source: The semantic key.
trans-unit.target: 语义键。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef" /> class, specifying the rule to reference and a string that contains a semantic key.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef" /> 类的新实例，指定引用规则和包含一语义键的字符串。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a rule reference to an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object within the containing grammar.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数创建的规则引用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>中包含的语法对象。

trans-unit.source: To create a rule reference to a `rule` element in an external grammar file, use any of the following constructors:
trans-unit.target: 若要创建的规则引用`rule`元素在外部语法文件中，使用任何以下构造函数：

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a grammar for choosing the cities for a flight.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建用于选择航班的城市语法。

trans-unit.source: The example constructs two <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef> instances, each of which specifies a semantic key.
trans-unit.target: 该示例构造两个<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>实例，其中每个指定的语义的项。

trans-unit.source: Both rule references target the same <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object, named `cities`, but tag the recognition result from the rule reference with a different semantic key.
trans-unit.target: 同时规则引用目标相同<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>对象，名为`cities`，但具有不同的语义键标记的规则引用的识别结果。

trans-unit.source: The semantic key identifies a recognized city as the departure city or the arrival city for the flight.
trans-unit.target: 语义键标识为不同城市或航班到达城市识别的城市。

trans-unit.source: The handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> event uses the keys to retrieve the semantics values created using <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.%23ctor%2A> from the recognition result.
trans-unit.target: 处理程序<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>事件使用的密钥来检索使用创建的语义值<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.%23ctor%2A>从识别结果。

trans-unit.source: The location of a grammar file outside the containing grammar.
trans-unit.target: 包含的语法外的语法文件位置。

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the rule to reference.
trans-unit.target: 参考的规则的标识符。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef" /> class, specifying the location of the external grammar file and the identifier of the rule to reference.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef" /> 类的新实例，指定要引用的外部语法文件的位置和规则的标识符。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a rule reference to a `rule` element in an external grammar file.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数创建的规则引用`rule`外部语法文件中的元素。

trans-unit.source: To create a rule reference to an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object within the same grammar, use any of the following constructors:
trans-unit.target: 若要创建的规则引用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>对象中的相同的语法，请使用任何以下构造函数：

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="uri" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="uri" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rule" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rule" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rule" /> is empty.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rule" /> 为空。

trans-unit.source: The object to reference.
trans-unit.target: 要引用的对象。

trans-unit.source: The semantic key.
trans-unit.target: 语义键。

trans-unit.source: The initialization parameters for a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef" /> 对象的初始化参数。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef" /> class, specifying the rule to reference, the string alias of the semantic dictionary, and initialization parameters.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef" /> 类的新实例，指定要引用的规则，语义字典的字符串别名和初始参数。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a rule reference to an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object within the containing grammar.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数创建的规则引用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>中包含的语法对象。

trans-unit.source: To create a rule reference to a `rule` element in an external grammar file, use any of the following constructors:
trans-unit.target: 若要创建的规则引用`rule`元素在外部语法文件中，使用任何以下构造函数：

trans-unit.source: The location of a grammar file outside the containing grammar.
trans-unit.target: 包含的语法外的语法文件位置。

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the rule to reference.
trans-unit.target: 参考的规则的标识符。

trans-unit.source: An alias string for the semantic dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 获取语义字典的别名字符串。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef" /> class, specifying the location of the external grammar file, the identifier of the rule, and the string alias of the semantic dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef" /> 类的新实例，指定外部语法文件的位置，规则的标识符和语义字典的字符串别名。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a rule reference to a `rule` element in an external grammar file.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数创建的规则引用`rule`外部语法文件中的元素。

trans-unit.source: To create a rule reference to an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object within the same grammar, use any of the following constructors:
trans-unit.target: 若要创建的规则引用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>对象中的相同的语法，请使用任何以下构造函数：

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="uri" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="uri" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="semanticKey" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="semanticKey" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="semanticKey" /> is empty.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="semanticKey" /> 为空。

trans-unit.source: The location of a grammar file outside the containing grammar.
trans-unit.target: 包含的语法外的语法文件位置。

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the rule to reference.
trans-unit.target: 参考的规则的标识符。

trans-unit.source: The semantic key.
trans-unit.target: 语义键。

trans-unit.source: The initialization parameters for a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef" /> 对象的初始化参数。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef" /> class, specifying the location of the external grammar file, the identifier of the rule, the string alias of the semantic dictionary, and initialization parameters.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef" /> 类的新实例，指定外部语法文件的位置，规则的标识符，语义字典的字符串别名和初始参数。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a rule reference to a `rule` element in an external grammar file.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数创建的规则引用`rule`外部语法文件中的元素。

trans-unit.source: To create a rule reference to an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object within the same grammar, use any of the following constructors:
trans-unit.target: 若要创建的规则引用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>对象中的相同的语法，请使用任何以下构造函数：

trans-unit.source: Defines a rule that can match spoken input as defined by the dictation topic associated with this grammar.
trans-unit.target: 定义可与与此语法关联的听写主题定义的朗读输入匹配的规则。

trans-unit.source: Defines a rule that can match any speech up to the next rule match, the next token, or until the end of spoken input.
trans-unit.target: 定义可与任何语音（到下一个规则匹配、下一个标记、或知道朗读输入结束）匹配。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that speech input can contain spelled-out letters of a word, and that spelled-out letters can be recognized as a word.
trans-unit.target: 指示语音输入可以包含单词的拼写的字母，并且拼写的字母可以识别为单词。

trans-unit.source: Defines a rule that is automatically matched in the absence of any audio input.
trans-unit.target: 定义在缺少任何音频输入时自动匹配的规则。

trans-unit.source: Gets the initialization parameters for a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef" /> 元素的初始化参数。

trans-unit.source: The initialization parameters for a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef" /> element.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef" /> 元素的初始化参数。

trans-unit.source: Gets an alias string for the semantic dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 获取语义字典的别名字符串。

trans-unit.source: An alias string for the semantic dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 获取语义字典的别名字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets the URI for the rule that this <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef" /> element references.
trans-unit.target: 获取此 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef" /> 元素引用的规则的 URI。

trans-unit.source: The location of the rule to reference.
trans-unit.target: 参考的规则的位置。

trans-unit.source: Defines a rule that can never be spoken.
trans-unit.target: 定义不能朗读的规则。

trans-unit.source: Inserting VOID into a sequence automatically makes that sequence unspeakable.
trans-unit.target: 将 VOID 插入到序列中自动使该序列不能口述。
